title: Error HH8: There's one or more errors in your config file

body: I guess the format of your key here is wrong `"accounts":["<my key>"]`. Are you using a 0x-prefixed hex string?

I faced same issue, and trying to print some value out 

```
$ npx hardhat compile
{
  url: 'https://eth-rinkeby.alchemyapi.io/v2/-xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx',
  accounts: [
    'cxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx4f519c26e9329c2c475417Y'
  ]
}
{"value":[{"value":["cxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx4f519c26e9329c2c475417Y"],"context":[{"key":"","type":{"name":"{ chainId: number | undefined, from: string | undefined, gas: (\"auto\" | number) | undefined, gasPrice: (\"auto\" | number) | undefined, gasMultiplier: number | undefined, url: string | undefined, accounts: (\"remote\" | Array<hex string> | { mnemonic: string, Error HH8: There's one or more errors in your config file:

  * Invalid value {"url":"https://eth-rinkeby.alchemyapi.io/v2/-xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx","accounts":["cxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx4f519c26e9329c2c475417Y"]} for HardhatConfig.networks.rinkeby - Expected a value of type HttpNetworkConfig.

To learn more about Hardhat's configuration, please go to https://hardha
```

Trying to study HttpNetworkConfig code but not able to point out where is the error.

I had masked out the value of alchemy and my private key into xxxxxx
